Comment.Language: For the Feast of the Entrance of the Lord Christ into the Land of Egypt:

Text.Language: Egypt, land of Pharaoh, rejoiced / By the entry of her true King / Jesus Christ who granted her promise / By destroying her idols and removing defiance.
